articles.author: Annie Karni, Luke Broadwater
articles.title: Biden Signs Law Making Juneteenth a Federal Holiday - The New York Times
articles.description: The law went into effect immediately, making Friday the first federal Juneteenth holiday in American history.
articles.content: Throughout history, Juneteenth has been known by many names: Jubilee Day. Freedom Day. Liberation Day. Emancipation Day. And today, a national holiday, Vice President Kamala Harris said, introducing … [+1625 chars]

articles.description: For his first meeting with Vladimir Putin in Geneva this week, President Joe Biden gifted his Russian counterpart a pair of American-made sunglasses in the US leader's signature aviator style.
articles.content:

articles.title: Juneteenth: What is the newest US holiday and how is it celebrated? - BBC News
articles.description: The commemoration of the last enslaved black American being freed is now an official US holiday.
articles.content:
media captionJuneteenth is a celebration of the freedom, culture and empowerment of African-Americans.
